# This file is part of Libiidm, a library to model IIDM networks and allows importing and exporting them to files.

if( BUILD_XML )
  add_executable(VoltageLevelShortCircuits1 VoltageLevelShortCircuits1.cpp )
  target_link_libraries(VoltageLevelShortCircuits1
    iidm-ext-voltagelevelshortcircuits-xml-testing
  )

  add_executable(VoltageLevelShortCircuits_cat VoltageLevelShortCircuits_cat.cpp )
  target_link_libraries(VoltageLevelShortCircuits_cat
    iidm-ext-voltagelevelshortcircuits-xml-testing
  )
endif()
